data.what_is:
Kartra is the all-in-one business platform for experienced creators, coaches, and experts to monetize their knowledge and services online. 

The platform includes everything you need to market and sell digital products-like email marketing, membership sites, pages, and checkouts. 

Forecast, automate, and optimize your sales with A/B testing, Funnel Simulator, and Real-Time Funnel Analytics.
data.product_description: Kartra is an all-in-one online business platform for internet marketers.

pricing_plans.plan_description: The Starter plan supports up to 2,500 contacts, 5 team members, and 1 custom domain. Users can send unlimited emails and SMS and create unlimited websites, pages, videos, products, and memberships and courses.

The Starter plan supports up to 2,500 contacts, 5 team members, and 1 custom domain. Users can send unlimited emails and SMS and create unlimited websites, pages, videos, products, and memberships and courses.

The Growth plan supports up to 12,500 contacts, 10 team members, and 3 custom domains. Users can send unlimited emails and SMS and create unlimited websites, pages, videos, products, and memberships and courses. The Growth plan also allows users to host webinars with 300 attendees and includes Funnel Simulation, Surveys & Quizzes, and Helpdesk support. Kartra Agency is included with this plan.

The Professional plan supports up to 25,000 contacts, 20 team members, and 5 custom domains. Users can send unlimited emails and SMS and create unlimited websites, pages, videos, products, and memberships and courses. The Professional plan also allows users to host webinars with 1,000 attendees and includes Helpdesk live chat, Surveys & Quizzes, Funnel Simulation, and Real-time Funnel Analytics. Kartra Agency is included with this plan.
plan_features: Everything included in Starter and Growth

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Data Synchronization
features.content: Syncs lead data within the sales database for consistency and accuracy

features.name: Analysis
features.content: Provides analysis on lead scores, funnel insights, and both open and closed opportunities

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 20 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Based on 20 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Based on 19 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Based on 18 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Based on 19 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Based on 17 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Based on 12 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Based on 14 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: Based on 16 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Based on 14 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 16 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Based on 12 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Based on 15 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Based on 12 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Based on 16 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Based on 11 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Based on 14 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar. This feature was mentioned in 10 Kartra reviews.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Based on 15 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices. 10 reviewers of Kartra have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Based on 10 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Based on 10 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting

Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Based on 13 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Based on 12 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Based on 11 Kartra reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
I like that Kartra is a most in one platform  and most of my business needs can be housed in one platform. This saves me time, and money every month. I like that the team is improving and adding new features to the platform at least a few time a year.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
Some of the filter features could be more robust, and I'd personally love a "save filter" feature to make things easier to find.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
Kartra is solving my need to have many tools in my business toolbox, by combining features into one platform this saves cost and time.

initial_reviews.review_title: Not as great as it seems at first glance
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
Allows for several users and has semi-granular permission categories.
The Calendars component is great for scheduling paid appointments.
The chat support is decent, available from midnight to 4am PST and 8am to Noon PST weekdays.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
The page redirection feature presented as a solution to protect content is cookie-based, meaning it will function correctly for maybe 30% of visitors. Even if a user is logged into one of your memberships that is hosted by Kartra, Kartra does not look at the tags they have associated with their contact record to determine if they are allowed access to one of your pages in Kartra. 100% cookie-based. So every visitor would be required to allow third-party cookies in their browser settings for this to have a chance at functioning. Third-party cookies are disabled by default for almost all browsers.
There are bugs in the email builder, page builder and membership builder that should have been worked out by the beta release. Working within these builders is very tedious and time-consuming as a result.
They do host videos for use in your memberships, but they must be uploaded and processed in real-time. The size restriction per video file is 999MB, which is not great if you have high-resolution videos.  Be prepared to split them into several files. The media upload tool has the option to queue up videos for upload, but in my experience, it is smarter to do one at a time because the queue has a tendency to fail and all videos in the queue are lost when that happens. So you must upload the video and then wait for it to process which takes 5, 10, 15 minutes each.
There is no functionality for creating reports and the analytics are basic.
The Funnels function they seem to be super proud of is nothing more than a mock representation of what might happen if you built out the pretend model that you can create in their Funnels function. It has no real use, it is all make-believe.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have been able to create some automations that have improved some of our processes, but honestly, nothing I couldn't have built with most other all-in-one SaaS solutions.

initial_reviews.review_title: Professional and Honest review about Kartra
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
The payment management system. Nobody talks about it, but it is by far the best feature Kartra has.

You can manage payments, cancelations, refunds, recurrent payments (including changing dates) all inside Kartra, not need to go to any of your payment processors.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
I don't like that Kartra needs to use re-directions when you use custom domains. This slows down page load speed.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
Having all my marketing tools in one place simplifies running operations. Being able to easily charge my clients online for my services is necesary for my business.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
Kartra is an all-in-one marketing platform that offers a range of features and tools for businesses. Some potential pros of Kartra include:

- Ease of use: Kartra is designed to be user-friendly and easy to navigate, making it accessible for businesses of all sizes and levels of technical expertise.
- Comprehensive feature set: Kartra offers a wide range of marketing tools, including email marketing, landing page builder, membership site builder, and more, which can help businesses streamline their marketing efforts and save time.
- Integration with other tools: Kartra integrates with a variety of other tools and platforms, such as payment gateways and webinar software, which can help businesses streamline their workflow and automate certain tasks.
- Customer support: Kartra provides access to a team of customer support representatives who are available to help users with any issues or questions they may have.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
There are a few potential cons to consider when evaluating Kartra as a marketing platform:

- Cost: Kartra is a paid platform, and the cost can be relatively high depending on the features and tools that a business needs. This may not be feasible for businesses with a limited budget.
- Limited customization: While Kartra offers a wide range of features and tools, some users may find that the level of customization is limited compared to other platforms.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
Following problems have been resolved by Kartra:

- Affiliate management: Kartra includes an affiliate management system that allows businesses to easily set up and manage an affiliate program to promote their products or services.
-Marketing automation: Kartra includes marketing automation tools that allow businesses to set up automated campaigns and workflows, which can help save time and improve the efficiency of their marketing efforts.

initial_reviews.review_title: Kartra-So much more than a Shopping Cart...or so I thought.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
Aside from the all-inclusive, email marketing, list building, web hosting, page building & so much more business management platform, the best feature I like best is knowing if you need help or support for anything, that Kartra is there for you. They give you every advantage under the sun to be successful in your business through their features and individualized customer support.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
Well since my first review. Alot happened. Shortly after I did this review, something very strange happened.
I woke up, did my thing and sat down in front of my laptop to login to my Kartra account.
Everything seemed normal, entered my username & password then clicked login.
Next thing i know, a popup appears telling me I have been blocked and to contact chat support.
Now aside from trying to figure out why i was blocked, I now needed to find a way to contact chat support, from the outside of my Kartra account.
Not an easy thing to do. My only option was to wait until I was in a different IP and try and login.
When all of those methods failed , days had turned into weeks, and weeks into months.
I had an associate who I iknew also had a Kartra account forward a message for me to Kartra support, explaining the situation.
Another few weeks later, I was finally contacted by someone at Kartra, who never really told me anything. Just that I was no longer welcome at Kartra.
This sudden lockout, cost me an entire years worth of commissions. Because as soon as I was locked out, everything in my account failed to renew, failed to re-activate and so on. None of my optin pages worked, my funnels were no more and basically my entire online business dissolved.
To this very day, I have never been told WHY this happened, or anything. You would think that for something to end like this, the way it ended, that you would want to let this customer/client know exactly what happened. So they may learn and gain a better understanding of what happened.
Kartra in this matter chose to ignore me, lock me out of everything, blacklist me. Totally breaking my online into tiny scattered pieces that I couldnt rebuild quite the same and it never did gain traction again.
I wish I had more to tell you but even I dont know and will never know why , out of the blue, i was locked out, never to return to Kartra.

Recommendations to others considering Kartra:
My advice. If you are serious about your business, and are looking for a platform that will give you the most solid foundation to grow and provide outstanding value to your clients and customers, then you owe it yourself & your business to make Kartra your home.

While the product itself is excellent, if you are unsure about something or dont have much experience with a funnel builder service like this, i would shy away cause as soon as something goes wrong, youll get shut out, shut down and out of business before you even know what happened.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
The major problem that I had was being able to see exactly what I had as far as campaign 'pieces'.  You'll wonder how your business ran without Kartra because when you dont have to log into separate websites for software, autoresponder's, Domain & Hosting vendors and page builders, are able to address ALL those aspects and more under 1 roof, you'll never want to use any other platform for your business.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best Sales and Marketing Tool I've Ever Used!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
The most helpful thing about Kartra is that it allows you to integrate your website, sales, marketing, and communication systems all into one. Not only have I been able to reduce costs but eliminate all these separate systems, I have been able to brand all my sites across all funnels.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
My only dislike at the moment is with some of the customizations currently unavailable. I want the ability to customize the login screen for specific content exclusive to members only. However, the default login screen is uncustomizable at the moment. Also, I'd like to see a little more robustness when setting wait states within the Sequence builder for minute increments instead of the default of 1 hour.

Recommendations to others considering Kartra:
Understand that Kartra is not a Blog tool like a WordPress site! Although you can build a blog and website, if you are looking to integrate your blog site to use with Kartra, consider keeping your website just for the blog and add Kartra for your primary website. Otherwise, you will be a bit dissapointed there are no RSS feeds available currently, and there is much setup necessary to get a blog site up and to run using Kartra.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
Kartra solved the problem of having multiple systems for my marketing, sales, communication, and website to provide a single solution. Additionally, it allows me to have a calendar for appointment setting and scheduling. I also like that I can build a training portal to offer memberships for my training and teaching video products and services. With the addition of Quizzes and Surveys, I can add them to my classes or send them out as lead magnets or reviews. The benefits to my business are simplified processes and offerings all under oneproduct.

initial_reviews.review_title: Kartra has been an awesome tool for my business
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
Kartra is a one-stop-shop for all of my marketing and sales campaigns.  Not only that, they have a phenomenal affiliate program. I love their customer service, astronaut academy (Kartracademy), their templates and designs, and the functionality of the interface and back office.  Everything is clean and works very well.  The way the leads are classified and able to be tagged are definitely awesome!

What do you dislike about Kartra?
There are some downsides to Kartra, as with any software.  One is the functionality of getting to emails and editing them.  Within a sequence or automation, you have to click through very tediously to get to the email, open the email, edit the email and save the email.  I would also mention some API integrations are not evident, and there are some hindrances in their checkout processes (minimal products). However, they are always working and improving.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am an affiliate marketer, so I love the aspect of being able to promote a product I love and use every day.  I've realized I don't need a lot of third-party integrations (there are some still lacking), but overall, it is a great setup for someone looking to capitalize on their website, landing pages, funnels, and marketing!

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
Nothing. Do not use Kartra.  It claims to be an easy all in one.
I had many seasoned professionals working with me that had trouble with it.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
1. It's supposed to be an all in one but my affiliates had trouble using it, hence my products and event were not promoted as they would have been which meant low attendance, low sales and some affiliates just gave up. My assistant spent hours trying to help them imput their info and retreive the seipe files.  I ended up having to email each and every affiliate to copy and images and promotion schedule because the interface made no sense.

2.  It does not allow you to register people for a free event.
You are forced to create a Product for people to register. Even if you set the dollar amount to zero, registrants are still required to provide payment information. that was a real dealbreaker. all_reviews.review_title: Not as great as it seems at first glance
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
Allows for several users and has semi-granular permission categories.
The Calendars component is great for scheduling paid appointments.
The chat support is decent, available from midnight to 4am PST and 8am to Noon PST weekdays.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
The page redirection feature presented as a solution to protect content is cookie-based, meaning it will function correctly for maybe 30% of visitors. Even if a user is logged into one of your memberships that is hosted by Kartra, Kartra does not look at the tags they have associated with their contact record to determine if they are allowed access to one of your pages in Kartra. 100% cookie-based. So every visitor would be required to allow third-party cookies in their browser settings for this to have a chance at functioning. Third-party cookies are disabled by default for almost all browsers.
There are bugs in the email builder, page builder and membership builder that should have been worked out by the beta release. Working within these builders is very tedious and time-consuming as a result.
They do host videos for use in your memberships, but they must be uploaded and processed in real-time. The size restriction per video file is 999MB, which is not great if you have high-resolution videos.  Be prepared to split them into several files. The media upload tool has the option to queue up videos for upload, but in my experience, it is smarter to do one at a time because the queue has a tendency to fail and all videos in the queue are lost when that happens. So you must upload the video and then wait for it to process which takes 5, 10, 15 minutes each.
There is no functionality for creating reports and the analytics are basic.
The Funnels function they seem to be super proud of is nothing more than a mock representation of what might happen if you built out the pretend model that you can create in their Funnels function. It has no real use, it is all make-believe.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have been able to create some automations that have improved some of our processes, but honestly, nothing I couldn't have built with most other all-in-one SaaS solutions.

all_reviews.review_title: The best all-in-one platform available
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
Kartra is an all-in-one marketing platform that offers a range of features and tools for businesses. Some potential pros of Kartra include:

- Ease of use: Kartra is designed to be user-friendly and easy to navigate, making it accessible for businesses of all sizes and levels of technical expertise.
- Comprehensive feature set: Kartra offers a wide range of marketing tools, including email marketing, landing page builder, membership site builder, and more, which can help businesses streamline their marketing efforts and save time.
- Integration with other tools: Kartra integrates with a variety of other tools and platforms, such as payment gateways and webinar software, which can help businesses streamline their workflow and automate certain tasks.
- Customer support: Kartra provides access to a team of customer support representatives who are available to help users with any issues or questions they may have.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
There are a few potential cons to consider when evaluating Kartra as a marketing platform:

- Cost: Kartra is a paid platform, and the cost can be relatively high depending on the features and tools that a business needs. This may not be feasible for businesses with a limited budget.
- Limited customization: While Kartra offers a wide range of features and tools, some users may find that the level of customization is limited compared to other platforms.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
Following problems have been resolved by Kartra:

- Affiliate management: Kartra includes an affiliate management system that allows businesses to easily set up and manage an affiliate program to promote their products or services.
-Marketing automation: Kartra includes marketing automation tools that allow businesses to set up automated campaigns and workflows, which can help save time and improve the efficiency of their marketing efforts.

all_reviews.review_title: Kartra-So much more than a Shopping Cart...or so I thought.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
Aside from the all-inclusive, email marketing, list building, web hosting, page building & so much more business management platform, the best feature I like best is knowing if you need help or support for anything, that Kartra is there for you. They give you every advantage under the sun to be successful in your business through their features and individualized customer support.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
Well since my first review. Alot happened. Shortly after I did this review, something very strange happened.
I woke up, did my thing and sat down in front of my laptop to login to my Kartra account.
Everything seemed normal, entered my username & password then clicked login.
Next thing i know, a popup appears telling me I have been blocked and to contact chat support.
Now aside from trying to figure out why i was blocked, I now needed to find a way to contact chat support, from the outside of my Kartra account.
Not an easy thing to do. My only option was to wait until I was in a different IP and try and login.
When all of those methods failed , days had turned into weeks, and weeks into months.
I had an associate who I iknew also had a Kartra account forward a message for me to Kartra support, explaining the situation.
Another few weeks later, I was finally contacted by someone at Kartra, who never really told me anything. Just that I was no longer welcome at Kartra.
This sudden lockout, cost me an entire years worth of commissions. Because as soon as I was locked out, everything in my account failed to renew, failed to re-activate and so on. None of my optin pages worked, my funnels were no more and basically my entire online business dissolved.
To this very day, I have never been told WHY this happened, or anything. You would think that for something to end like this, the way it ended, that you would want to let this customer/client know exactly what happened. So they may learn and gain a better understanding of what happened.
Kartra in this matter chose to ignore me, lock me out of everything, blacklist me. Totally breaking my online into tiny scattered pieces that I couldnt rebuild quite the same and it never did gain traction again.
I wish I had more to tell you but even I dont know and will never know why , out of the blue, i was locked out, never to return to Kartra.

Recommendations to others considering Kartra:
My advice. If you are serious about your business, and are looking for a platform that will give you the most solid foundation to grow and provide outstanding value to your clients and customers, then you owe it yourself & your business to make Kartra your home.

While the product itself is excellent, if you are unsure about something or dont have much experience with a funnel builder service like this, i would shy away cause as soon as something goes wrong, youll get shut out, shut down and out of business before you even know what happened.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
The major problem that I had was being able to see exactly what I had as far as campaign 'pieces'.  You'll wonder how your business ran without Kartra because when you dont have to log into separate websites for software, autoresponder's, Domain & Hosting vendors and page builders, are able to address ALL those aspects and more under 1 roof, you'll never want to use any other platform for your business.

all_reviews.review_title: Best Sales and Marketing Tool I've Ever Used!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
The most helpful thing about Kartra is that it allows you to integrate your website, sales, marketing, and communication systems all into one. Not only have I been able to reduce costs but eliminate all these separate systems, I have been able to brand all my sites across all funnels.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
My only dislike at the moment is with some of the customizations currently unavailable. I want the ability to customize the login screen for specific content exclusive to members only. However, the default login screen is uncustomizable at the moment. Also, I'd like to see a little more robustness when setting wait states within the Sequence builder for minute increments instead of the default of 1 hour.

Recommendations to others considering Kartra:
Understand that Kartra is not a Blog tool like a WordPress site! Although you can build a blog and website, if you are looking to integrate your blog site to use with Kartra, consider keeping your website just for the blog and add Kartra for your primary website. Otherwise, you will be a bit dissapointed there are no RSS feeds available currently, and there is much setup necessary to get a blog site up and to run using Kartra.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
Kartra solved the problem of having multiple systems for my marketing, sales, communication, and website to provide a single solution. Additionally, it allows me to have a calendar for appointment setting and scheduling. I also like that I can build a training portal to offer memberships for my training and teaching video products and services. With the addition of Quizzes and Surveys, I can add them to my classes or send them out as lead magnets or reviews. The benefits to my business are simplified processes and offerings all under oneproduct.

all_reviews.review_title: Kartra has been an awesome tool for my business
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
Kartra is a one-stop-shop for all of my marketing and sales campaigns.  Not only that, they have a phenomenal affiliate program. I love their customer service, astronaut academy (Kartracademy), their templates and designs, and the functionality of the interface and back office.  Everything is clean and works very well.  The way the leads are classified and able to be tagged are definitely awesome!

What do you dislike about Kartra?
There are some downsides to Kartra, as with any software.  One is the functionality of getting to emails and editing them.  Within a sequence or automation, you have to click through very tediously to get to the email, open the email, edit the email and save the email.  I would also mention some API integrations are not evident, and there are some hindrances in their checkout processes (minimal products). However, they are always working and improving.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am an affiliate marketer, so I love the aspect of being able to promote a product I love and use every day.  I've realized I don't need a lot of third-party integrations (there are some still lacking), but overall, it is a great setup for someone looking to capitalize on their website, landing pages, funnels, and marketing!

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
Nothing. Do not use Kartra.  It claims to be an easy all in one.
I had many seasoned professionals working with me that had trouble with it.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
1. It's supposed to be an all in one but my affiliates had trouble using it, hence my products and event were not promoted as they would have been which meant low attendance, low sales and some affiliates just gave up. My assistant spent hours trying to help them imput their info and retreive the seipe files.  I ended up having to email each and every affiliate to copy and images and promotion schedule because the interface made no sense.

2.  It does not allow you to register people for a free event.
You are forced to create a Product for people to register. Even if you set the dollar amount to zero, registrants are still required to provide payment information. that was a real dealbreaker. Again result: low attendance and LOTS of complaints and suspicion as to why they needed to enter payment info for a free online event.

3.  Support was useless.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
NONE! It caused a disaster and cost me a lot of money and ruined my launch. . I will never use it again.

I had to buy other programs at the last minute to do what I needed.

all_reviews.review_title: Kartra is a very powerful platform with many tools.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
Have a good user interface, which makes our lives easier.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
- Kartra branding on emails should be removed and should be able to reduce the size of the information on the bottom (Unsubscribe and Address)
- Should have an easier way to monitor links clicked on broadcast sent. (Right now it's very complicated, specially if have more the one link on a single email)
- Unpublish a page
- Should have "Undo" on broadcasts (if by accident delete something, have to do it all again - "Confirm Delete" popup )
- Coupon for "Extra Month", "Extra week" or specific time period
- On "Sales" at Dashboard homepage, should have the option to see monthly sales (not only the last 7 days)
- For no reason, many users have been blacklisted (should have a way to fix it)

Recommendations to others considering Kartra:
Kartra is a great all in one marketing and management system.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
- Easy to create landing pages
- Membership
- payment integration
- Monitoring
- Automation

all_reviews.review_title: The easiest software out there to get your business online
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
Everything is easy to learn and straightforward to use.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
Because we use it so much, we get really random problems with it. When we reach out for customer support, the answer is YUP, that's a problem.

Also, the billing and recurring payments system is poorly thought out. You don't get notified when someone misses a payment, which seems pretty odd.

Recommendations to others considering Kartra:
Invest in the learning curve. Don't rely on the "done for you campaigns" at the start because they are ridiculously complex. Understand how to build a funnel backwards. Allow frustration, trial and error. I can now launch a landing page and associated tags, emails and stuff in 4 hours.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have moved a great deal of my business online because of Kartra. It's allowed me to grow a recurring revenue stream in my business that has solved a lot of business problems.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Internet Marketing Consultant PPC | SEO | SEM | Lead Generation

all_reviews.review_title: Kartra is not there yet. Many features, little mastery.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
Kartra is an all-in-one solution that will potentially take the place of many separate providers.

The email marketing system is simple to use and an email blast can be sent out rapidly and efficiently compared to my experience with Mailchimp.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
The calendar system, in particular, is repetitive and cannot be cloned to create additional classes. Rescheduling classes is difficult, adding text in certain areas for instruction while booking is not intuitive and if you add these instructions where it allows space, those instructions are also used on a second page, after the reservation is made, where it looks like an error because it's completely inappropriate placement after booking. There are so many little issues like this throughout the system.

With customising the content, some areas us RGB color scheme, others use HEX and yet others cannot be customised at all and you need to select one of the colors in the array given.

The membership areas are not nearly as customisable as the pages, which is a disappointment because the  flashy sales pages may bring in the customers, but the membership area is what the audience pays for.

Importing an email list that was collected from Mailchimp or other source can be difficult to impossible and I have had several lists not approved.

I understand that Kartra is a very complex system, but it is far from ideal and the requested upgrades are painfully slow. I've been using Kartra for 10 months now and I have two memberships built, numerous pages, and over 10 classes on two calendars. It's been a frustrating system and difficult company to work with.

Recommendations to others considering Kartra:
Be willing to put up with quirks and slow upgrades of Kartra. Calendars/scheduling is the newest feature and the most troublesome, in my opinion.

I have great hopes that Kartra will work on more rapid upgrades and really listen to the needs of the people who are paying for their platform.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email marketing is easier so my clients are hearing from me more often.

I am not impressed with the quirks and complexity of much of the rest of Kartra. Hopefully this will improve with time.

all_reviews.review_title: Gives me all I need and more and  They are dedicated to continuous improvement.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
Like any platform, it may take a bit to learn everything.  Kartra's training is great, and I went through the beginning.   Once I started using it, it became so easy because they are consistent in their presentation of functionality across different functional areas.

I like Kartra the most because I can tie all my business components together.   I used to have 4 different autoresponders, 2 different funnel builders and was going to have to pay to add on a calendar and helpdesk and other functionality that is standard in Kartra.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
I have a problem because I cannot export the reports.   The reporting is very good but I like to see keep track of things in my spreadsheets and I cannot export the data from my reports to excel or a CSV.

Recommendations to others considering Kartra:
I looked at clickfunnels, builderall,

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have great insights into my lists and how they perform.   It is easy to filter the right people into my broadcast emails and eliminate those who I want to omit.   It brings almost all my online business functions in one place.

all_reviews.review_title: Okay all-in-one internet marketing software, but extremely slow UI and terrible customer support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
It's convenient to have page builder, membership site, automations, affiliates, autoresponders, video content all in one place and be able to tag people based on behaviors.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
The UI takes forever to build anything, their pop-up checkout form is so slow it doesn't even work. We have screen recordings of customers waiting over 7 minutes for checkout form to load. It cost us alot of money in lost sales. Customer support was absolutely awful and incompetent, when I tried to get help from the Facebook community they deleted my post and directed me to customer support who was useless. Found out later they know it's an issue and were hiding it. Knowing what we know now, we would not have signed up for Kartra; it's a pain to leave once things are built there though. We will eventually migrate away, all of our new campaigns are being built outside of Kartra

Recommendations to others considering Kartra:
Might be good to get your feet wet if you're new to internet marketing, but if you're doing significant business, I would not go with Kartra

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automated online marketing and broadcast emails

all_reviews.review_title: All-in-one solution for marketers, with a few things missing.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
1) Having a complete solution for all my needs
2) Done for you campaigns (saves a TON of time)
3) Templates are nicely done
4) Support is helpful and present

What do you dislike about Kartra?
1) Checkout forms: they are very limited (for example, you can't insert custom fields nor make them mandatory); this is a big problem as it doesn't allow me to gather all the data I need to comply with the Italian law.
2) Not listening enough to customer's opinions/needs: there are some feature requests created 1-2 years ago, that have not been implemented
3) Bandwith: I believe it's very limited. The vast majority of companies don't have such strict bandwidths.
4) Some things in general with the interface are not that straightforward: for example, if you close the browser windows where you've been working but haven't saved, no message will pop-up telling you that you haven't saved.  Or, if you save, and right after you exit from the editor, a message will pop-up telling you that you'll lose all the unsaved work (it doesn't make sense having this if you have indeed saved).

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
Creating my membership site + all the funnel for my course.

all_reviews.review_title: Great platform but challenging to learn for the lessexperienced
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
Kartra does many of the things that my virtual assistant loves for summits and webinars. It looks clean on the receiver (emails, etc) and colors are easy on the eyes when you are the user.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
I love learning in a simple way, but Kartra does not make it simple for the regular user to learn the platform even with the Kartraverse Training portal. It will require too much of my time to dig and start working it.   I am a physician who would like to have the ease to start doing my own summits without the help of a virtual assistant but it would take me tooooo long!
Also the price point is high.  Now I have gone for a $99/month to a $199, so I am seriously consider to change.
Categories to find what you want to do are not simple and as a person who would use it less than often for now, I is time wasting to go through each category to find the place I need to go and complete a specific job.

Recommendations to others considering Kartra:
There are easier platforms that are less expensive, so you must consider value vs time of learning among others

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am starting an online school and do virtual summits.  They have good templates and their platform is robust once you know how to use it, I guess.  My assistant can put a summit funnel in no time, but not mE!!

all_reviews.review_title: So, So Good But Lacks In The User-Friendly Department
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
There are a lot of things to like about Kartra, specifically the absolute all-in-one platform they have. It goes far beyond just designing a website/landing page or sending an email. They cover all the bases - from websites, landing pages, email marketing/automation with sequences and tagging, funnels, simple e-commerce, digital downloads, membership sites, help desk, scheduling, forms, affiliates and now an agency solution. If you'd like to consolidate the many platforms you use, Kartra can handle 95% of everything you throw at it.

Their support group on Facebook is second to none. They truly care about their people and it shows; it's like a family.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
Learning the platform was a long, complicated process. They have people lined up that will help "onboard" you and while that's extremely helpful and effective, I think it's always beneficial to know your platform inside and out so you can make necessary changes as needed and not have to depend on the support team, or others. Because of the complexity, there's a time-consuming process you'll have to undertake before you can "go live". I mean, it makes sense due to the fullness and depth of their platform, just be sure to go into it knowing: (1), the trial is not nearly long enough to know if it's a right fit for your business, and (2), it'll take time to setup your workflows and make sense of how everything is integrated, and (3), host your videos elsewhere or you'll get eaten alive in bandwith overcharges.

Kartra has what they call Kartraverse, which is like a step-by-step training course on how to use their platform. It's superb and very informative; however, it's still in its infancy and you have to wait until they create the next lesson before you can do in-depth with whatever topic they decide, and that was often frustrating. With that said, however, they also do a lot of webinars that are in-depth and full of insight, but sitting through a webinar to find one answer is a bit defeating when you're in a hurry or just not really sure what exactly you're even looking for. Their documentation leaves a little to be needed.

Their page designer is also a bit on the clunky side without a lot of flexibility, and that's one place where they lost me. I don't like being held to rigid flows, templates and outlines. There's also not a way to remove their branding from emails, just so you know, in case that's a big turn-off for you. Kartra requires a lot of back and forth and in the beginning that can be extra confusing and frustrating. Once you get to know their method, it definitely makes sense, but it just seems that there has to be a better way of doing it so it's more user friendly.

PS:  Make sure you save your work... and save often!

Recommendations to others considering Kartra:
It's definitely a platform everyone should try, as it has so much untapped potential, just go into it knowing that there's a lengthy and often difficult setup process.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
I no longer use Kartra but when I did, the best thing I found was the fact that it was all-in-one. I really liked being able to login to one platform and it was all there, even analytics and in-depth reports based on product, emails, link tracking, etc. It truly was full-service.

all_reviews.review_title: A comprehensive All-in-One business solution
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
So many aspects of my business can be addressed through Kartra. It saves me from having to subscribe to many different service providers. I truly love the (almost) All-in-One approach. There are many training videos and the Facebook group is an awesome resource for extra tips and immediate help. I am happy with Kartra, because it allowed me to really upgrade the online presence of my business, and to automate my sales and the communication with my clients. It enhances my ability to have a detailed database of my clients, their purchase activity and browsing behaviors. Once I learned how to utilize the different modules, it became very easy to duplicate existing segments or modify templates. I also appreciate, that Karta continues to work on the integration of even more features.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
There are new features added frequently. That is in itself a good thing. But it requires keeping up with the changes. A couple of times it resulted in me having to redo things. So sometimes the many different levels of complexity interfere with each other and create a bit extra work. Also, the initial learning was pretty time consuming.

Recommendations to others considering Kartra:
It is a great product with high ambitions. For me signing up with Kartra was the right decision and has already paid off.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
I use Kartra to create and host my main web-presence, it is my client database and my main communication platform to keep m students/clients in the loop. Kartra enables me to have various membership sites with e-learning modules.

I love how well it covers the bases and fits together, eliminating the need for all the usual collection of various software solutions (that you end up working hard to get talking to each other and continuing to do so smoothly).

What do you dislike about Kartra?

Recommendations to others considering Kartra:
Try it out if you truly have the need for its functionality. And if you do, invest in the Udemy course that really walks you through how to use it in practice.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Kartra for lead capture, for product setup, shopping cart and payments, and our membership areas. Plus we use it for email campaigns and communicating with our members.

all_reviews.review_content:

The flexibility and numerous configuration options make this a very capable CRM and auto-mailer system.  It seems like the OEM has really though through the use cases and the result is a very robust feature set

What do you dislike about Kartra?
The learning curve is not a curve, it's more like a 90-degree wall.  In spite of the videos and online Wiki, this is a very complicated system to configure.  All of the power and flexibility (and there is a whole lot of both) has translated into a system that is not intuitive in the least.

all_reviews.review_title: Amazing platform for online business. I wish I would have grabbed it at the beta rate.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
Kartra is awesome for coaches/course creators/consultants and those with a need for a membership platform. The payoff once everything is set up is that it's mostly hands-off and runs itself. It's super easy to attach your payment processor(s) and create different payment options for your products. Setting up each area is accompanied by inline, easy to understand instruction that even self-professed non-techies can conquer.

What do you dislike about Kartra?
One issue I had with Kartra was that each element had to be published before it could be attached/linked to another, which means a lot of back and forth when you have a product that has multiple parts: product, landing page, membership portal + all the little pieces that made each of those up.

The other issue, which was an issue for me as an advanced WordPress designer, was the restrictions and  having to format each block of the design repeatedly. Admittedly, given time constraints of the project, I was unable to search around for landing page customization tutorials which may have helped to iron out the issues we were having with how images appeared on mobile if even the tiniest modification was made to a preset content block.

The saving grace with that part of the cons was that it was super easy for me to create the landing pages we wanted in WordPress and have CTA buttons connect to the checkout page and subsequent automations in Kartra, so it wasn't a total loss.

Recommendations to others considering Kartra:
If total control of the design of elements like landing pages is important to you, you may want to host those pages elsewhere. Outside of that, things move a lot smoother when you have your content together, including payment terms, return policies, pricing options and canned email text.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
My experiences with Kartra came by way of my role as Consultant and Designer, assisting one client with making the decision to move ahead with Kartra, and another with the setup and rollout of her programs.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Kartra?
Kartra is a great tool for very very small and simple operations but their features stop at a basics '' drag and drop'' sales page building that any industry software provides. Their customer/subscriber features are the worst. There is no way for you to handle customers as you would do in a CRM. The sales metrics are useless and not accurate, the product and checkouts will work for your first 20 customers and will just be so limited for any sort of growth.




What do you dislike about Kartra?
THEIR CUSTOMER SUPPORT IS THE WORST. You have to wait up to 6 days for an answer from their unqualified team. All they do is send you links to their FAQ or Blog and don't look at your issues.

IMPORTANT: If you ever decide to leave kartra or cancel your account, ALL YOUR CUSTOMERS WILL BE CANCELLED AND DELETED AND YOU WONT BE ABLE TO EXPORT THEIR PAYMENTS INFO TO A NEW PLATFORM>

KARTRA TRY TO KEEP YOU HOSTAGE OF THEIR PLATFORM.


Recommendations to others considering Kartra:
Stay Away. Stick to industry leaders like click funnel or others, or simply look into a POWERFUL and REAL subscription billing system because once you get started with Kartra, problems will come as you grow.

What problems is Kartra solving and how is that benefiting you?
ONLY ADDED ISSUES TO OUR GROWING BUSINESS
